title: Awesome List Updates on Jan 24, 2023

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Email - Mail Delivery Agents

*   [Cyrus IMAP](https://www.cyrusimap.org/) - Email (IMAP/POP3), contacts and calendar server. ([Source Code (⭐590)](https://github.com/cyrusimap/cyrus-imapd)) `BSD-3-Clause-Attribution` `C`
items.content_html:
Software / Communication - Email - Mail Delivery Agents

  • Cyrus IMAP - Email (IMAP/POP3), contacts and calendar server. (Source Code (⭐590)) BSD-3-Clause-Attribution C

items.title: Awesome Substrate
items.content_text:
### Social

*   [Substrate Developers Chat (Telegram)](https://t.me/substratedevs) - Chat with other Substrate developers, also bridged to [matrix](https://matrix.to/#/#substratedevs:matrix.org).

### Videos

*   [Substrate Seminar Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/polkadotdev) - Biweekly stream hosted by Polkadot Developers Twitch.
    *   [Old Seminar Crowdcast](https://www.crowdcast.io/e/substrate-seminar-2/) - Seminar archive.
    *   [Older Seminar Crowdcast](https://www.crowdcast.io/e/substrate-seminar/) - Older still Seminar archive.

### Templates

*   [polkadot-js-api-ts-template (⭐19)](https://github.com/kianenigma/polkadot-js-api-ts-template) - A template project to kickstart hacking on top of `@polkadot/api`.
*   [INK!athon](https://inkathon.xyz/) - Full-stack dApp boilerplate with ink! smart contracts and a React frontend using the `useInkathon` (listed below) hooks library maintained by [Scio Labs](https://scio.xyz).

### Client Libraries

*   [Rust API Client (⭐265)](https://github.com/scs/substrate-api-client) - Rust client maintained by [Supercomputers Systems AG](https://www.scs.ch/).
*   [`useInkathon`](https://github.com/scio-labs/use-inkathon) - Typesafe React Hooks library abstracting functionality by polkadot.js for working with Substrate-based networks and ink! smart contracts maintained by Scio Labs.

### Tools

*   [Minimark (⭐4)](https://github.com/kodadot/packages) - Implementation of RMRK NFT v1/v2 protocol maintained by KodaDot.
*   [Nova Polkadot Utils (⭐36)](https://github.com/nova-wallet/nova-utils) - Contains static info & metadata to support client apps in Polkadot ecosystem to map it to various netowrks.
*   [Polkadot PANIC (⭐38)](https://github.com/SimplyVC/panic_polkadot) - Monitoring and alerting solution for Polkadot nodes by Simply VC, compatible with many Substrate chains.
*   [Typechain-Polkadot (⭐13)](https://github.com/Supercolony-net/typechain-polkadot) - Hepls users to generate typescript types from contract ABIs (ink!) and generate runtime code to interact with contracts and deploy them.

### Products and Services

*   [PrivHost](https://privhost.laissez-faire.trade/) - Public Tor .onion supported nodes for Polkadot, Kusama and Edgeware.
*   [Substrate Devops Guide](https://paritytech.github.io/devops-guide/) - Parity devops team's configuration and guidance on deploying, monitoring, and maintaining node infrastructure.

### SCALE Codec

*   JavaScript / TypeScript implementations:
    *   [polkadot-js/api (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/polkadot-js/api/tree/master/packages/types) - Maintained by Polkadot-JS.
    *   [scale-ts (⭐17)](https://github.com/unstoppablejs/unstoppablejs/tree/main/packages/scale-ts#scale-ts) - Maintained by Josep M Sobrepere.
    *   [soramitsu/scale-codec-js-library (⭐6)](https://github.com/soramitsu/scale-codec-js-library) - Maintained by Soramitsu.
items.content_html:
Social

  • Substrate Developers Chat (Telegram) - Chat with other Substrate developers, also bridged to matrix.

Videos

  • Substrate Seminar Twitch - Biweekly stream hosted by Polkadot Developers Twitch.
    • Old Seminar Crowdcast - Seminar archive.
    • Older Seminar Crowdcast - Older still Seminar archive.

Templates

  • polkadot-js-api-ts-template (⭐19) - A template project to kickstart hacking on top of @polkadot/api.
  • INK!athon - Full-stack dApp boilerplate with ink! smart contracts and a React frontend using the useInkathon (listed below) hooks library maintained by Scio Labs.

Client Libraries

  • Rust API Client (⭐265) - Rust client maintained by Supercomputers Systems AG.
  • useInkathon - Typesafe React Hooks library abstracting functionality by polkadot.js for working with Substrate-based networks and ink! smart contracts maintained by Scio Labs.

Tools

  • Minimark (⭐4) - Implementation of RMRK NFT v1/v2 protocol maintained by KodaDot.
  • Nova Polkadot Utils (⭐36) - Contains static info & metadata to support client apps in Polkadot ecosystem to map it to various netowrks.
  • Polkadot PANIC (⭐38) - Monitoring and alerting solution for Polkadot nodes by Simply VC, compatible with many Substrate chains.
  • Typechain-Polkadot (⭐13) - Hepls users to generate typescript types from contract ABIs (ink!) and generate runtime code to interact with contracts and deploy them.

Products and Services

  • PrivHost - Public Tor .onion supported nodes for Polkadot, Kusama and Edgeware.
  • Substrate Devops Guide - Parity devops team's configuration and guidance on deploying, monitoring, and maintaining node infrastructure.

SCALE Codec

  • JavaScript / TypeScript implementations:
    • polkadot-js/api (⭐1.1k) - Maintained by Polkadot-JS.
    • scale-ts (⭐17) - Maintained by Josep M Sobrepere.
    • soramitsu/scale-codec-js-library (⭐6) - Maintained by Soramitsu.

items.title: Awesome No Login Web Apps
items.content_text:
### Games / Others

*   [Gidd.io](https://gidd.io/) - Collection of classic games like UNO, Yatzy, Scattergories and GeoGuess.
items.content_html:
Games / Others

  • Gidd.io - Collection of classic games like UNO, Yatzy, Scattergories and GeoGuess.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Community / SRAM

*   [MicroPython on Mastodon / Fediverse](https://fosstodon.org/@MicroPython) - Follow MicroPython in the Fediverse.

### IDEs / SRAM

*   [ESP32-MPY-Jama (⭐472)](https://github.com/jczic/ESP32-MPY-Jama) - Tool for managing Espressif ESP32 microcontrollers with MicroPython.
items.content_html:
Community / SRAM

  • MicroPython on Mastodon / Fediverse - Follow MicroPython in the Fediverse.

IDEs / SRAM

  • ESP32-MPY-Jama (⭐472) - Tool for managing Espressif ESP32 microcontrollers with MicroPython.
